main event: A civilian reported a reddish white and green light that was stationary but moved in a circular motion over Miamisburg, Ohio on June 22, 1968.
interesting points: The object was observed for 20 minutes, The observer described the object as a bright orb emitting colors of green, white, and red, The object appeared to stand still, speed up, slow down, and change direction rapidly, There were no photographs taken of the sighting, The report concluded it was probably the star Altair.
witness description: a 40-year-old male with prior military experience in the Coast Guard
